title: Fix email address not displaying in EnrollmentSection

requirements.text: In the EnrollmentSection component, ensure the email address athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com is visibly rendered on the page. Audit the component for any conditional rendering, CSS visibility issues, or logic that may be hiding the email callout, and fix it so the email appears prominently regardless of form state (idle, submitting, or success).
acceptanceCriteria: The email address athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com is visible on the enrollment section when the page first loads.
The email address remains visible in both the default form state and after a successful form submission.
The email is rendered as a clickable mailto link or clearly styled text callout.
No CSS properties (display:none, visibility:hidden, opacity:0, etc.) are hiding the email element.
The email callout is visible on both mobile and desktop screen sizes.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ (immutable paths).
Do not alter the backend schema or inquiry submission logic.
nonGoals: Adding new sections or features to the landing page.
Changing the form fields or submission flow.
Redesigning the EnrollmentSection layout beyond fixing the email visibility issue.
